headline.main: If bin Laden Is Brought to Trial

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Regarding Anne-Marie Slaughter's plea for a trial of Al Qaeda prisoners by international tribunal rather than American military commission (Op-Ed, Nov. 17): Thanks to misguided reform, unlike the Nuremberg and Tokyo tribunals, modern international courts may no longer apply the death penalty, even in cases of mass murder by war criminals.
abstract: Cathal J Nolan letter comments on Prof Anne-Marie Slaughter's November 17 Op-Ed article, which argued for trial of Al Qaeda terrorists by international tribunal rather than American military commission
snippet: To the Editor:    Regarding Anne-Marie Slaughter's plea for a trial of Al Qaeda prisoners by international tribunal rather than American military commission (Op-Ed, Nov. 17):     Thanks to misguided reform, unlike the Nuremberg and Tokyo tribunals...
